pkgmetadata.longdescription: Time Series Analysis // Analyzes autocorrelation and partial autocorrelation using surrogate methods and bootstrapping, and computes the acceleration constants for the vectorized moving block bootstrap provided by this package. It generates percentile, bias-corrected, and accelerated intervals and estimates partial autocorrelations using Durbin-Levinson. This package calculates the autocorrelation power spectrum, computes cross-correlations between two time series, computes bandwidth for any time series, and performs autocorrelation frequency analysis.
